Swedish low-energy experimental pile 瑞典小功率实验性反应堆
sleep ： 普通用词，指一般的睡眠。可用作引申指长眠或静止不动。
doze ： 多用于口语中，指轻微的小睡或处于半睡状态。
slumber ： 多指人安详地或长时间地睡。

word_mean: 睡眠：躯体和精神休息期，其间意志和意识部分或完全消失，人体部分功能暂停
也认为睡眠是一种行为状态，特征为特有的不动姿势，对外界刺激的感觉降低但易恢复。睡眠分为两期，即非快眼动期((NREM sleep)和快眼动期(REM sleep)

sentence.Network_en: I didn't get a wink of sleep on the aeroplane.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在飞机上没合一下眼。

sentence.Network_en: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

sentence.Network_en: Jem was full of beans after a long sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰姆好好睡了一觉之后又变得精力充沛了。

phrase.cizu_name: one could do something in one's sleep

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)one regards something as so easy that it will require no effort or conscious thought to accomplish
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)睡着也能做，不用想也能做完

lj.lj_ly: she knew the music perfectly, could sing it in her sleep.
lj.lj_ls: 她非常熟悉这首音乐，睡着也能唱。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)avoid interfering in a situation that is currently causing no problems but may well do so as a result of such interference
make someone unconscious by using drugs, alcohol, or an anaesthetic
jx.jx_cn_mean: （用毒品、酒精或麻醉剂）使某人失去知觉

jx.jx_en_mean: kill an animal, especially an old or badly injured one, painlessly (used euphemistically)
jx.jx_cn_mean: (婉)使（老、幼、重伤动物）无痛死去

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)delay making a decision on something until the following day so as to have more time to consider it
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)把（问题等）留到第二天再作决定

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. in imperative]sleep well (said to someone when parting from them at night)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 睡个好觉（晚上分别时用语）

jx.jx_en_mean: sleep very lightly, aware of what is happening around one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 睁着一只眼睛睡，睡得不好

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English slēp, slǣp (noun), slēpan, slǣpan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch slapen and German schlafen

entry.def: Sleep is the natural state of rest in which your eyes are closed, your body is inactive, and your mind does not think.

example.ex: They were exhausted from lack of sleep...
example.tran: 由于缺乏睡眠，他们非常疲惫。

entry.def: When you sleep, you rest with your eyes closed and your mind and body inactive.

example.ex: During the car journey, the baby slept...
example.tran: 坐车来的路上，宝宝睡着了。

example.ex: I've not been able to sleep for the last few nights.
example.tran: 前几个晚上，我一直都无法入睡。

entry.def: A sleep is a period of sleeping.

example.ex: I think he may be ready for a sleep soon.
example.tran: 我想他也许很快就要睡一觉了。

entry.tran: (大楼、房间等)可供(若干人)住宿，睡得下(若干人)
entry.def: If a building or room sleeps a particular number of people, it has beds for that number of people.

example.ex: The villa sleeps 10 and costs £530 per person for two weeks.
example.tran: 这座别墅可以住下 10 人，每人两周的费用是 530 英镑。

entry.def: If you cannot get to sleep, you are unable to sleep.

example.ex: I can't get to sleep with all that singing.
example.tran: 那些歌声搅得我无法入睡。

entry.tran: 对…十分担心;为…而睡不着觉
entry.def: If you say that you didn't lose any sleep over something, you mean that you did not worry about it at all.

example.ex: I didn't lose too much sleep over that investigation.
example.tran: 我并不太担心那个调查。

entry.tran: 好好考虑一夜;把…留待第二天再作决定
entry.def: If you are trying to make a decision and you say that you will sleep on it, you mean that you will delay making a decision on it until the following day, so you have time to think about it.

entry.tran: 使(尤指有病或有伤的动物)无痛苦地死去;使长眠
entry.def: If a sick or injured animal is put to sleep, it is killed by a vet in a way that does not cause it pain.

example.ex: I'm going take the dog down to the vet's and have her put to sleep.
example.tran: 我要把小狗带到兽医那里，让她安乐死。

means.word_mean: 1. a natural and periodic state of rest during which consciousness of the world is suspended;

sentences.sentence: "he didn't get enough sleep last night"
"calm as a child in dreamless slumber"

means.word_mean: 3. a period of time spent sleeping;

sentences.sentence: "he felt better after a little sleep"

means.word_mean: 4. euphemisms for death (based on an analogy between lying in a bed and in a tomb);

sentences.sentence: "she was laid to rest beside her husband"
"they had to put their family pet to sleep"

means.word_mean: 2. be able to accommodate for sleeping;

auth_sentence.content: I only had about one-and-a-half hours sleep every day.
auth_sentence.res_content: I only had about one-and-a-half hours sleep every day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I only had about one-and-a-half hours sleep every day.

auth_sentence.res_content: You may also be suffering with obstructive sleep apnoea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You may also be suffering with obstructive sleep apnoea.

auth_sentence.content: Whatever the criteria, Losing Sleep would measure up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever the criteria, Losing Sleep would measure up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever the criteria, Losing Sleep would measure up.

Sentence.sentence: Excuse me, can I get a ticket for a sleeping compartment on this train?
You've now heard it so many times, you can probably repeat it in your sleep.
Or if you do climb higher sooner, come back down to a lower height when you sleep.

sentences.en: He had only a brief sleep that night.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上他只睡了一会儿。

sentences.en: Of course, I don't always sleep in the afternoons.
sentences.cn: 当然, 我并不总是在下午睡觉。

sentences.en: He began to drink, drank himself to intoxication, till he slept obliterated.
sentences.cn: 他一直喝, 喝到他快要迷糊地睡着了。

means.word_mean: 为…提供床位，可供…睡觉，可供…住宿

sentences.cn: 这旅馆可供四百人住宿。

jushi.english: His sleep was broken by a strange noise.
jushi.chinese: 他被奇怪的声音吵醒了。

jushi.english: He is never idle saving sleep.
jushi.chinese: 他除睡觉时外从不闲着。
最后的睡眠意思是死了。
